long_description: Find your way using map, compass, altimeter and GPS with this updated classic handbook for learning to navigate in the backcountry. Authors: Bob Burns and Mike Burns. Softcover; 141 pages; illustrations. The Mountaineers Books; copyright 2004. Book covers all the latest technology and time-tested methods to help you learn to navigate--from compasses and geomagnetism to how to read a map. GPS chapter completely updated to reflect newer models and features of GPS receivers now available. Expanded to include a section on routefinding on glaciers, along with additional information on changing declination. Extensive illustrated examples of orientation and navigation.
